class: full-width, middle

![car_dashboard](https://pixfeeds.com/images/auto/1280-663596802-car-dashboard.jpg)

???

**NOTES**

What information are displayed ?

Interactive ?

What are the users objectives ? What decision are made from these measures ?

How often each of those information are updated ? Consulted ?

Is there a reason information is organized this way ? What about the size ? What about the colors ?

Who is the audience ? What is their expertise ?

Is it a good dashboard ? What makes it good or bad ?

Is it similar to our purpose ? How ?

**NOTES**

What information are displayed ?

What are the users objectives ? What decision are made from these measures ? 

How often each of those information are updated ? Consulted ?

Is there a reason information is organized this way ? What about the size ? What about the colors ?

Who is the audience ? What is their expertise ?

Is it a good dashboard ? What makes it good or bad ?

Is it similar to our purpose ? How ?

---

class: definition, middle, center

***(1) A dashboard is a visual display***

of the

***(2) most important information needed to achieve one or more objectives***

and uses 

**(3) organization and interactivity to make key information accessible**

so it can be

***(4) monitored at a glance***

---

### Evaluation criterias

üçï **Information**

* Sufficient to achieve objectives and make decisions
* No superfluous or overwhelming
* Interactivity and filtering of meaningful properties
* Updated adequately
* Fits user expertise
* Terminology is meaningful to the user

ü•ó **Organization**

* Salience. Position and size of information reflects their importance
* Important information is highlighted
* Grouped or colocated by similar activities and entities
* Compared information are close
* Workflow from top-left or top-center

üçí**Visual appeal**

* Color is used purposefully
* Legibility
* Use of space

---
